item.title: [PI] two questions
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

thanks so much for the tip i got the if u have 70 in all skills working now i just need maxhit one

btw, i mean to only add 1 int i want to know when they hit that number just once when in game cause if they had a 20 one time they get an easy achievement done

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] two questions
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

I think the max hit one is just about right but instead of = you would want to put >= so it make it so if it hits 20 or any number above it, it would add the int. Also for the int thing you would want to put += instead of = cause that would keep it at 1 unless that how you want it. I don’t know/think thats the right method though… You might have to make a new one.

The second one you would need to make it so everytime you level, it would add one. same thing with above for where it adds the number, += instead of =.

Hope I could help some, not going to spoon feed

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] two questions
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

how do i make a statement saying if player hits a number on npc or player he will get an int so like
if(c.playerstotalmaxhit = 20){
c.maxhit = 1;

and also how do i do the same thing but with levels?
so like
if(c.playerskill[12] = 60)
c.skill = 1;

Read full topic
